Projects

Robotic design projects, both competitive and recreational, are at the heart of what we do. Our projects are variable in budget, members involved, and duration, but they all go through a similar application and checkpoint process. We are happy to fund enthusiastic membersâ€™ ideas and firmly push our teams to accomplish their goals stay on schedule.

We are in our first weeks of existence at this point, so our projects list is minimal at this point. As our membership and funding increases, expect to see several exciting new projects!
